title: Adaptive Helm or Abyssal on Fighters??
body: I have a question, do you guys think that Adaptive Helm is good on bruisers/fighters like Darius,Jax,Renekton,Yi or do you think that Abyssal would be better vs magic DMG teams?

replies.body:
Spirit is still the best for Fighters, because of the Heal Boost.

Adaptive is then better if you get poked to hell, and the Lane Phase is all about to survive {{champion:27}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:17}} 


And i dont think you read Abysall very well...
If you have alot AP User in your Team or yourself are an AP Tank ({{champion:111}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:3}} ) then build this so every AP User in your Team will make 10% more AP DMG.
Its like Amumus new Passive.
These Items are not build on bruisers, these items are for tanks.
No imagine if you have 3 AP Champs and you are an AD-Tank like Poppy abyssal would be good,and my question was if they have like 4  AP Champs would you go Spirit and adaptive Helm?

As I write these Items are good on tanks and weak on bruisers. So yes its good on Poppy if you have many AP champions in your team. 

Yes, if they would have 4 SP Champions i would go Spirit and Adaptive.
